subject: Halls of Fame
Steroids
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: When the Hall of Fame ballot is announced in November, Roger Clemens, Barry Bonds and Sammy Sosa will be put before baseball’s ultimate court of opinion.
snippet: When the Hall of Fame ballot is announced in November, Roger Clemens, Barry Bonds and Sammy Sosa will be put before baseball’s ultimate court of opinion.
